title: Apogee ACS-8 Professional full range speaker
item_description:
Apogee ACS-8 Professional full range speaker

  • Apogee ACS-8 Professional full range speaker
  • Format: Bi-amp, two-way
  • Drivers: HF - 2" compression driver, LF - 15" cone
  • Nominal Impedance: 8 ohms each driver
  • Sensitivity: HF 104dB, LF 98dB SPL 1 w @ 1 meter
  • Frequency Response: 46Hz - 16kHz Max SPL: 125dB cont., 131dB peak @ 1 meter
  • Power Handling HF/LF: 150/500w cont., 600/2000w peak
  • Dispersion: 60º H x 40º V
  • Very Good Condition
  •
